General.Name: G2 Goldfields Inc
General.Description: G2 Goldfields Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of gold deposits in Guiana. It primarily holds 100% interests in the properties located in the Oko Aremu District and Puruni District, Guyana. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 141 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3L5

1.Name: Mr. Daniel Joseph Noone B.Sc., BAPSCI (GEOL), M.B.A., MBA
